fields.description:
The export feature seems to be broken.

{code}
$ cd /tmp/
$ wget http://apache.arvixe.com/activemq/5.11.1/apache-activemq-5.11.1-bin.tar.gz

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
